page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: This area has the second highest { {crime rate }in {Hampshire}.Basingstoke being the highest.Most crimes are in the large housing estates such as West End,Townhill and Harefield,{vandalism} and{burglary}being the most common crimes although many young offenders try{shoplifting}.{Bitterne police {station}is the main station for this area which is the largest outside London and the Metropolitan counties. Bitterne police force comprises of seven {police motor cyclist}(including the only lady police motor cyclist in Hampshire),two sergeants and six policemen on the beat.There are no patrol cars based at Bitterne.The police in this area are very concerned about the high crime rate and are endeavouring to reduce this by sending out standard cars with plain clothes policemen.
